JOB DESCRIPTION:
Software developers required with 2 to 4 years of experiece.
Requirements
Qualifications: Graduate Degree or equivalent in computer science
Expert knowledge of .Net programming (C# ,  ASP.Net ,  MVC ,  Linq ,  Entity Framework ,  WPF ,  WCF etc.)
Good knowledge of Javascript ,  JQuery ,  Ajax ,  API development
Good knowledge of database management ,  query designing (MS Sql Server ,  My SQL)
Good knowledge of web application designing (HTML ,  CSS etc.)

EDUCATION.UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Computers
EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Computers
